start: Hi, welcome to Halt and Catch Wildfire bot.
fallback: Sorry, didn't get that. Again, do you see fire?
start_and_question: Hi, welcome to Halt and Catch Wildfire bot. You will help finding when the fire originated. Do you see a fire in the following picture?
question: Can you see fire?
finish: Great, you found it, fire started on %s. If you want to start again, just type /start
error_with_game: Something's not right. Please start again
